prompt: Retrieve all data from the "albums" table.
List all unique names from the "artists" table.
Retrieve the first and last names of all employees.
Get the total number of customers.
response: SELECT COUNT(CustomerId) AS TotalCustomers FROM customers;

prompt: Find the titles of all albums along with their corresponding artist names.
response: SELECT albums.Title, artists.Name AS ArtistName FROM albums INNER JOIN artists ON albums.ArtistId = artists.ArtistId;

prompt: List the names and email addresses of all customers.
response: SELECT FirstName, LastName, Email FROM customers;

prompt: Retrieve the total sales from the "invoices" table.
response: SELECT SUM(Total) AS TotalSales FROM invoices;

prompt: Find the genres with their respective names from the "genres" table.
Get the names of all playlists.
Retrieve the track names and their respective album titles.
response: SELECT tracks.Name AS TrackName, albums.Title AS AlbumTitle FROM tracks INNER JOIN albums ON tracks.AlbumId = albums.AlbumId;

prompt: List the titles and artists of all tracks.
response: SELECT tracks.Name AS TrackTitle, artists.Name AS ArtistName FROM tracks INNER JOIN albums ON tracks.AlbumId = albums.AlbumId INNER JOIN artists ON albums.ArtistId = artists.ArtistId;

prompt: Retrieve the names of all media types.
Get the first and last names of all employees along with their titles.
response: SELECT FirstName, LastName, Title FROM employees;

prompt: Find the total price of all invoice items.
response: SELECT SUM(UnitPrice * Quantity) AS TotalPrice FROM invoice_items;

prompt: List the names and countries of all customers.
response: SELECT FirstName, LastName, Country FROM customers;

prompt: Retrieve the names of all artists and their corresponding album counts.
response: SELECT artists.Name AS ArtistName, COUNT(albums.AlbumId) AS AlbumCount FROM artists LEFT JOIN albums ON artists.ArtistId = albums.ArtistId GROUP BY artists.ArtistId;

prompt: Find the total duration of all tracks.
response: SELECT SUM(Milliseconds) AS TotalDuration FROM tracks;

prompt: Get the names of all playlists along with the number of tracks in each.
response: SELECT playlists.Name AS PlaylistName, COUNT(playlist_track.TrackId) AS TrackCount FROM playlists LEFT JOIN playlist_track ON playlists.PlaylistId = playlist_track.PlaylistId GROUP BY playlists.PlaylistId;

prompt: Retrieve the names of all tracks with their respective genres.
response: SELECT tracks.Name AS TrackName, genres.Name AS GenreName FROM tracks INNER JOIN genres ON tracks.GenreId = genres.GenreId;
